## gpioWrite() function

This sets the level of an output GPIO.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gpioWrite(handle: number, gpio: number, level: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The GPIO device handle as returned by [gpiochipOpen()](./lgpio.gpiochipopen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

gpio


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The GPIO number


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

level


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

The logical level to set


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This command will work for any GPIO claimed as an output (even if a member of a group).
